Uses of Interface
org.universAAL.lddi.abstraction.ExternalDatapoint

  • Packages that use ExternalDatapoint 
    Package Description
    org.universAAL.lddi.abstraction
    This package assumes that there are external (meaning not readily connected to universAAL) networking-enabled HW/SW components to which we may need access in a universAAL network.
    org.universAAL.lddi.abstraction.config.data  
    org.universAAL.lddi.abstraction.simulation
